summary: This document is an offender details report for Jeffrey Epstein, detailing his enrollment in a work release program. It includes personal information, conditions of his sentencing, and his employment details.

locations: 358 El Brillo Way, Palm Beach, Florida 33480

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was enrolled in a work release program starting on October 10, 2008.
He was sentenced to 12 months plus 6 months consecutive probation.
The report indicates that Epstein was involved in a prostitution case with case numbers 2006CF009454AXX and 2008CP009381AXX.
His employer during the work release was the Florida Science Foundation.
The report includes various personal details such as his height, weight, and other identifying information.
